mapper.select: select menu_id, menu_name, perms, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from menu where menu_id = #{menuId}
mapper.insert: insert into menu(menu_name, perms, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{menuName}, #{perms}, #{parentId}, #{orderNum}, #{path}, #{component}, #{menuType}, #{visible}, #{icon}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into menu(menu_name, perms, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into menu(menu_name, perms, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.menuName}, #{entity.perms}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.orderNum}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.menuType}, #{entity.visible}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update menu_name = values(menu_name), perms = values(perms), parent_id = values(parent_id), order_num = values(order_num), path = values(path), component = values(component), menu_type = values(menu_type), visible = values(visible), icon = values(icon), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update menu
menu_name = #{menuName},
perms = #{perms},
parent_id = #{parentId},
order_num = #{orderNum},
path = #{path},
component = #{component},
menu_type = #{menuType},
visible = #{visible},
icon = #{icon},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where menu_id = #{menuId}
